text: 'in aladhin kafaruu ballh, wakadhabuu bima ja'ahum bih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wayamnaeun ghyrhm min aldukhul fi din allh, wayasuduwn rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam walmuminin fi eam "alhdyby" ean almasjid alhram, aladhi jaealnah lajamie almwmnyn, swa' almuqim fih walqadm 'ilyh, lahum eadhab 'alim mwje, waman yurid fi almasjid alharam almyl ean alhaqu zlmana fyaes allah fyh, nudhiqh min eadhab 'alim mwje
